homeTextOne.label: The Brand Studio creates, develops,produces, markets and builts creative brand concepts for talents, online and offline retailers, brands and mediaplatforms. This strong private label concepts and productions are tailor-made and respond to commercial trends.
readMore.label: Read more
serviceSubtitle.label: Brand development & building
serviceText1.label: We invent, develop and realize new brands with unique USP’s for talents (influencers and celeberties) and media platforms. Based on strong DNA’s from the talents or media platforms we determine a joint brand strategy including implementation and creative partnership collaborations with the online and offline retailers. The sales and (online) marketing, PR-realization and the setting up and management of own webshops are among the possibilities within the total implementation.
serviceSubtitle2.label: Brand, retail & licentie-productions
serviceText2.label: If desired, we come up with innovative private label concepts & productions for retailers and brands, including collabs with talents. We take the time-consuming process of creation, product development, sourcing, production and distribution of new products off your hands. We have built up our private label expertise and licensed productions within the sectors  jewelery, fashion, body & swimwear, beauty & fragrance, personal care, home essentials and beauty & fashion accessories.
serviceSubtitle3.label: Premium Concepts
serviceText3.label: We devise and produce creative give-aways concepts to stimulate sales for our clients. But also business-to-business gifts, gifts for loyalty programs and private label productions for events. Within the concepts, we focus on the target audience, budget, timing and the tailor-made realizations of the premiums.

aboutUsTitle.label: About us
aboutUsText.label: The brand studio is the private label division of MY Jewellery. Sharon Hilgers (founder MY Jewelery) is creative director and has a strong sense of commercially successful trends & productions. Together we form a complementary team consisting of creative specialists in every field of jewelery, beauty & frangrance, fashion, body & swimwear, home essentials and accessories. Our projectmanagers take care of the entire process and ensure well-streamlined and high-quality productions.
aboutUsTeamTitle.label: Het team behind the brand studio
careerText.label:
The Brand Studio is a young innovative company with talented and ambitious employees. Important within The Brand Studio is a creative cheerful mind, a driven personality, a dose of willpower and a great empathy.We are always looking for people within this profile who want to join our team.

Do you recognize yourself in this? Please contact us via
contactText.label: Curious about our full service concepts? Ambitious to start your own brand or to expand your brand? Please contact us
